description: The entity will attempt to toss the items from its inventory to a nearby recently played noteblock.

listen_time.description: Sets the time an entity should stay near a noteblock after hearing it.

speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when moving toward the block.

start_distance.description: Sets the distance the entity needs to be away from the block to attempt to start the goal.

stop_distance.description: Sets the distance from the block the entity will attempt to reach.
